about to download.... i can hardly wait, n whats this about the books going downhill after the TV show?
 If you have any idea about how R Kirkman feels about the book you would know this is his prize project, his baby! He has stated many times that he is in the position to NOT be influenced by money making ventures and has promised  us to keep the book going until its not good anymore, He and many of the fans self included hopes it will run for many a year to come.Granted there hasn't been allot in the way of forwarding the story of late but he is just lulling us in to a false sense of security. Keep reading and keep buying the books i just download these digital editions until the trades come out and there cool to have on the go too. May the Dead keep Walking!!
thanks for the upload dude Nice!!
